The period of sending Location by SMS or Facebook.

1.This feature needs to keep 3G network.

2.It will not login unless you use previous version of Facebook application.

3.If you exit or turn off the power when application is sending to Facebook, it WILL NOT send Location!
You have set username and password before, do you want to delete and continue?\n\nNotes: If you has not type any data in programe, It will not auto-send by Facebook!

"If your mobile hasn't been discovered, it will send location to your friends or your Facebook's wall about your mobile's location."

If you want to initial 3G network setting, learning on internet by yourself,please.

This tutorial teaches you just how to enable 3G network. 

Trun on by this setp︰
Phone[Settings]→[Wireless and networks]→[Mobile networks]→[Data enabled]
Trun on by this setp︰\n\nPhone[Settings]→[Location and security]→[Use wireless networks] or [Use GPS satellites]
"After you turn on drop protection, you can leave. \n"Drop protecting" will run in the background even when mobile is in standby mode. \nThank you for using this application."
During mobile dropping to sending latitude/longitude, it will require some time, so you can choose to stop sending data by then.
Action you did has not stop sending location!\n\nPlease try to move the brick at the top of the Left.
Congratulations!\n\nYou have studied how to stop sending location!
[Do not drop Droid] is an application when you drop your mobile will alert you and your mobile will be protected in any time.
When your mobile dropped, the application will show the picture and alert you.
